name: PastorUndertakerTales
0:
”Alexa, open pastor undertaker tales”
”Alexa, start pastor undertaker tales”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pastor undertaker tales
des:
Listen to an interactive spooky story with sound effects and prompts. When you open the skill, Alexa asks for character names and other information to fill in the blanks. Get ready for laughs and giggles as your audience fills in the blanks.
The conversation between a pastor and an undertaker is set in a modern graveyard, where graves are disturbed by bounty hunters for the medical academic industry, in a conversation between a pastor representing faith and the undertaker, representing science and technology, the status of mankind as flatlanders, aspiring a place on the true Earth of Lemurian sciences is revealed, maybe man belongs only to a biosphere, of a mother spaceship, denied the true sky, space and the oceans, even the sun Helios, which is truly our star!
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
